p: Full-cells consisting of the polymer-coated TiO 2 NTs/polymer/LiFePO 4 were cycled at different C-rates varying from C/10 to C/2 in the potential window of 0.5â€“2.8 V. The charge and discharge rates of a battery are expressed by the C-rate; it means a battery is charged and discharged relative to its maximum capacity. The rate nC means the current will charge and discharge the full capacity in 1/ n hour.
